20101202204400.571|20101202204401.286|CCO|    
20101202204401.286|20101202204402.000|CCO|    that's caused by a clot,
20101202204402.000|20101202204402.714|CCO|

20101202204403.429|20101202204404.143|CCO|    But PLAVIX helps save lives.
